title: Hitting Below The (Bible) Belt
summary:
Key ideas
- The author is not good at writing atheism blogs with demeaning jokes.
- The author is gradually getting better at a certain skill.
- The author watched a funny video on the Patheos blog Why I Am Catholic.
- The video was of comedians asking for opinions on the new Pope who had not been elected yet.

Key learnings
- The author learned that they are not good at writing atheism blogs.
- They also learned that they do have a sense of humor.

Key questions
- None mentioned.
